sn23.9:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.9:1.3: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.4: Evaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn23.9:1.5: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.6: Evaṃ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn23.9:1.8: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.9: Evaṃ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn23.9:1.10: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha.
sn23.9:1.11: Evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati …pe… anuppādadhamman”ti.
